title: An admonition giuen by one of the Duke of Sauoyes Councel to his hignesse, [sic] tending to disswade him from enterprising against France. Translated out of French, by E.A.
author: Aggas, Edward.
notes: A translation of: Remonstrance d'un conseiller.
Running title reads: An admonition to the Duke of Sauoy.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
